title: SEC Commissioner on Memes, Crypto and Bubbles
description:
Plus, a Brown University economist, Mark Blyth, on why chat room trading might not be so dumb.

Note: The views expressed by SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce are her own views, not necessarily those of the SEC or her fellow commissioners.
